title: MK Stalin's Letter To Sonia Gandhi, Others To Unite For Social Justice - NDTV
content: MK Stalin's Letter To Sonia Gandhi, Others To Unite For Social Justice  NDTVView Full coverage on Google News
description: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin wrote a letter to several leaders across the country urging all those who believe in equality and social justice to come together. He addressed the letter to Congress leader Sonia Gandhi and 36 other leaders.
